answers.answer: People hate the test they think it's nasty but I like it! The stuff they make you drink just tastes like super syrupy soda.. I don't know how you dr does it but they told me not to eat before I went and you just drink it wait an hour and get your blood drawn and they called me with my results within days..

Ok well they test for it around 28 weeks u will go and drink this orange or lemon flavored drink. u will have to stay there for a hour. They will take ur blood. And if u have diabetes they will call and tell u. Or ur dr will tell u. Andu will have to watch what u eat but idk if there are signs before hand i have never had it but thats what will happen.

question: Tell me everything!When do they do it?What's it like?Are there any warning signs that you may have it already?What happens if you have it?
title: gestational diabetes test
